thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Town Fair Tire is new to the area. I decided to take my chances and get my tires and rotation for my Subaru there instead of Subaru. Let's just say, I will be going there from now on! It saves me an hour of driving, I walked over to Applebee's and had lunch with my son and the car was done before we were done with lunch. Awesome customer service, very polite, and we're knowledgeable!
